name: Air Purifier
description:
A low-income elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) has a medical condition that causes frequent shortness of breath and resulting in recurrent hospital admissions.  
   
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking for a donation of an air purifier to improve the quality of air in his home, and to reduce the frequency of re-admissions to hospitals due to breathlessness.
  
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact caseworker Yu Xin at 8292 2205. We appreciate if the donor could deliver the item to THK Cluster Support @ Geylang office at 93 Paya Lebar Way. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: Elderly Phone
description:
A low-income elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) has difficulty using a smartphone as it is too complex for him. He often presses on the keypad unknowingly which then causes issues with making and receiving phone calls. 
  
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking for a donation of a senior-friendly mobile phone so that the client is able to use it easily and reach out to call someone when he needs help. 
 
Sample of a senior-friendly mobile phone in this link:   
https://shopee.sg/Y2K-3G-Flip2-Senior-Citizen-Phone-(Elderly-Phone)-(1-Year-Local-Warranty)-i.24008870.4407150823
  
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact caseworker Yu Xin at 8292 2205. We appreciate if the donor could deliver the item to THK Cluster Support @ Geylang office at 93 Paya Lebar Way. During a home visit, the caseworker will pass the donated phone to the client and set up the phone for him. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: Digital Television or Television with Digital Set-top box
description:
A low-income elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) lives alone and does not have a television at home.  
  
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking for a donation of a Digital-Ready TV or TV with Digital Set-top Box (Medium size) to help the client stay occupied at home. 
  
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact caseworker Yu Xin at 8292 2205. We appreciate if the donor could deliver the item to THK Cluster Support @ Geylang office at 93 Paya Lebar Way. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking for a donation of a geriatric chair with wheels. 
 
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Gregory Ho at 8292 2210.   
 
Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.  
  

THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.
